<title level="1" right="Action">[Spinning Crush](/Actions.aspx?ID=920) <actions string="Three Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 110</row>

**Requirements** You're wielding a loaded firearm or loaded crossbow.

</column>

---

You go into a vicious spin, smashing your weapon into those nearby and increasing your momentum by firing. All creatures adjacent to you take 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your Strength modifier; this increases to 2d6 if your firearm has a [_striking_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) rune, 3d6 if it has a _greater striking_ rune, and 4d6 if it has a _major striking_ rune. This ability does not apply other effects that increase damage with your firearm Strikes such as weapon specialization. Creatures affected by this attack must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. A creature that fails its save is also [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 5 feet directly away from you.
